Package ezvcard.io.text

Interface Summary
VCardRawReader.VCardDataStreamListener Handles the vCard data as it is read off the data stream.
VCardRawWriter.ProblemsListener A listener whose methods are invoked when non-critical issues occur during the writing process.
 

Class Summary
FoldedLineReader Automatically unfolds lines of text as they are read.
FoldedLineWriter Automatically folds lines as they are written.
FoldingScheme Specifies how a vCard should be folded when written to a string.
VCardRawReader Parses a vCard data stream.
VCardRawWriter Writes data to an vCard data stream.
VCardReader Parses VCard objects from a plain-text vCard data stream.
VCardWriter Writes VCard objects to a plain-text vCard data stream.
 

Exception Summary
VCardRawReader.StopReadingException Instructs a VCardRawReader to stop reading from the data stream when thrown from a VCardRawReader.VCardDataStreamListener implementation.
